What are the treatments for enlarged parietal foramina ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of enlarged parietal foramina:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Enlarged Parietal Foramina  - Genetic Testing Registry: Parietal foramina  - Genetic Testing Registry: Parietal foramina 1  - Genetic
